Line1.1086F0: Samil. A backstabbin' cur. Run off while indebted to me. Four bodies I was promised. He’s shy one. What, did he think I wouldn’t notice?
Line3.1086F0: (sigh) I’m too busy to hunt him down myself. The Tree’s demands are many. Find this Samil - before Wejinhani is reminded what it means to anger a witch.  He was supposed to be in the graveyard. Start there.
